Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide Hp1035 (Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 5.10, NDBP-5.10; Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the scorpion NDBP 5 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Amphipathic peptide with probable antibacterial activities. Hp1035 peptide, showing high homology to Hp1090, exhibited no anti-HCV activity.

Literature.Title: A new natural alpha-helical peptide from the venom of the scorpion Heterometrus petersii kills HCV.
Literature.Author: Yan R, Zhao Z, He Y, Wu L, Cai D, Hong W, Wu Y, Cao Z, Zheng C, Li W.
